DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, double-blind, multicentre, parallel pilot clinical trial to study the efficacy of a treatment of lactulose 15 ml + vitamin D 400 U + calcium 0.5 g compared to lactulose placebo 15 ml + vitamin D 400 U + calcium 1 g in bone mass preservation among postmenopausal women.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate if Adding Lactulose to Vitamin D and Calcium Has an Effect on the Preservation of Bone in Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Women aged between 55 and 65 years old; postmenopausal who have amenorrhea for 5 or more years; women with the diagnosis of osteopenia defined DMO 1,5 to 2,5 Any disease causing osteopenia (hyperthyroidism, hyperparathyroidism, hypercortisolism, osteogenesis imperfecta, rheumatoid arthritis, homocystinuria, etc.)
DOC.keyword: lactulose; randomised clinical trial; osteopenia; postmenopause
